title: Deadly Gossip
description: Exposing the truth could be fatal.Known as 'The Fixer' among the Hollywood Elite, my job is to bury Hollywood secrets before they become tabloid gossip. I operate in the shadows and keep the truth from seeing the light of day. That is of course until I end up smack dab in the middle of the story of the year. I know the rules. Dating a client is forbidden. However, Hollywood Heartthrob Duncan Scott, with his crooked smile and gorgeous blue eyes, has set his sights on making me the next Mrs. Scott.Tiny problem. There already is a Mrs. Scott...and sheâ€™s not going quietly. No one in Hollywood tells the truth. Everyone has secrets. But will this gossip prove deadly?
author: Brittanee Nicole
